title: CGPA IN ECE
content:
How much CGPA do people score in ECE

comments.body: Out of our or kiss placements goodbye. CSE bois will steal your core ECE job also
Damn, how is that possible, isn't a ece degree compulsory for core ece jobs?
Ask placements 2023 team we got fucked out of jobs as non CSE students
But how pa, companies open those jobs to only ece students right?
